prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with rugged features and a determined expression.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a boulder, with arms and a fierce stance.
Imagine a small, rocky creature emerging from the mountains, ready to battle.
Generate a Pokemon with a tough exterior, showcasing strength and resilience.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a stone, but has a lively personality.
Give me a Pokemon inspired by geological formations, with unique color patterns.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the earth, with arms raised in triumph.
